title: New MPfree: Mirror Lady – Roman Candles
content:
Although probably not ‘new’ by International Internet Relevance Committee standards (may not actually exist yet), this track from Los Angeles trio Mirror Lady is certainly worthy of hearing.

Combining folk-pop songwriting with lo-fi recording aesthetics, all topped off by rather unique vocals, Roman Candles is a thoughtful slice of indie-pop. Lyrically it’s spot on as well; with “and when your heart attacks, you’ll be screaming my name” being a particularly poignant highlight. Check out Roman Candles below, and download it for free if you fancy.
